title: Tahmahri looking for players!
body:
Have you ever had that wonderful dream of one day becoming one of the best players in Oceania? Have you ever thought you have the skills to outduel an Oceanic god like Raydere? 

This is where you come in!

Tahmahri are a newly formed team who are looking at achieving the OCS in split 2, and potentially the OPL one day.  Each and every one of the current players have a goal, and they make the effort to achieve that goal. Right now, as the team is new, we will be competing in smaller tournaments, but as time goes by, we will rise! Right now, we are looking for:
- A toplaner
- A jungler
- A coach

Applicants are preferred to be Diamond+, however applicants Platinum+ will also be considered.

If you have any enquiries or would like to apply, add either of these people in game and we can discuss things further:
- Jimuskin
- Cutelittleahri
